Text: Upload ppl and tell us wat u think
works fine..however need to download daemon tools for people that aint got it

I am using the daemon tools prol 5.1.0.0333 and I cannot see the Advance Emulation option though I have checked all check boxes mentioned in instruction.. it says counterfiet or virtual dvd detected .. any idea?
zeeraxis - Unistall damenon tools install again and when installing select SPTD - so that advanced emulation is enabled and it will then work
